home.title: Welcome to Skillspot
home.description: Find services and skills near you

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Skillspot, Find services and skills near you
about.intro1: Skillspot is a modern platform from Germany that brings people and services together easily, transparently, and locally. Our goal is to make the search for the right provider as uncomplicated as possible while offering local service providers a strong digital presence.
about.intro2: Whether it's craftsmen, IT services, tutoring, or creative services: Skillspot makes offers visible, comparable, and directly reachable.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: We want to rethink local services.
mission.text: Instead of confusing classifieds portals or anonymous platforms, we focus on:
mission.point3: direct communication between customers and service providers
mission.footer: This creates trust, efficiency, and a fair marketplace for everyone involved.

special.title: What makes Skillspot special
special.intro: Compared to classic platforms, Skillspot pursues a clear focus:

point1.title: Strong Local Focus
point1.text: Services are specifically displayed in your area, including distance and location on the map.

point2.title: Direct Communication
point2.text: Customers and providers can chat directly with each other, clarify offers, and discuss details without detours.

point3.title: Transparency through Reviews
point3.text: Real reviews and clear profiles create trust and help you make the right decision.

audience.title: Who we are here for
audience.point1: Individuals who need help or services quickly
audience.point2: Companies looking for reliable local partners
audience.point3: Service providers and craftsmen who want to gain new customers
audience.footer: The focus is deliberately on regional networking, with the possibility of growing supra-regionally later.

who.title: Who we are
who.intro: Skillspot was developed by two founders:
who.text: As a small, dedicated team, we are continuously developing Skillspot and actively listening to the feedback from our users.

values.title: Our Values
values.intro: Our work is based on clear fundamental principles:
values.footer: These values shape every decision in the further development of the platform.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text1: We believe in a future where local services are digitally just as visible and accessible as large online offers.
vision.main: Skillspot aims to become the central platform for local services in Germany and eventually connect people in other countries as well.
vision.footer: In doing so, we don't just want to mediate, but create real digital neighborhoods.

cta.title: Become part of Skillspot
cta.subtitle: Whether as a customer or as a provider:
cta.text: Discover Skillspot and experience how easy local services can work today.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. This privacy policy explains what personal data we collect and how we use it when you use Skillspot.

dataTypes.title: 2. Data we process
dataTypes.intro: Depending on how you use the platform, we may process the following data:
dataTypes.item1: Account data: name/display name, email address, authentication ID (e.g., Auth0 subject).
dataTypes.item2: Profile data: role (user/provider), optional address and location coordinates (lat/lon) if you act as a provider.
dataTypes.item3: Content data: services you create (title, description, category), chat messages, reviews.
dataTypes.item4: Technical data: IP address (temporarily), browser/device information, logs, timestamps.

purposes.title: 3. Purposes of processing
purposes.intro: We process data for the following purposes:
purposes.item1: Providing platform features (login, profile, categories, services, chat).
purposes.item2: Showing providers and services near you (only for provider profiles and if location data is available).

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal bases
legalBasis.intro: Depending on the context, processing is based in particular on:
legalBasis.item1: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract / use of the platform).
legalBasis.item2: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interests, e.g., IT security and platform operation).
legalBasis.item3: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent), where we ask for your consent.

auth0.title: 5. Authentication (Auth0)
auth0.content1: For login and authentication, we use an external authentication service (e.g., Auth0). This involves processing data required for authentication, in particular your email address and a technical user identifier.
auth0.content2: We receive a unique user ID (subject) from the service to link your account within Skillspot. Skillspot does not store passwords.

location.title: 6. Location data
location.content1: If you act as a provider, you can enter an address. Location coordinates (lat/lon) may be calculated from it to show your position on the map.
location.content2: Providing location information is voluntary, but it may be necessary for the map feature to be useful for providers.

chat.title: 7. Chat and reviews
chat.content1: When you use the chat, message content and timestamps are stored so communication between users and providers can work.
chat.content2: When you submit a review, the star rating and text are stored and displayed with the referenced service.

recipients.title: 8. Recipients and sharing
recipients.intro: We generally do not share personal data with third parties, except:
recipients.item1: when required to use services (e.g., authentication via Auth0),

storage.title: 9. Storage period
storage.content: We store personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes described or as required by law. You can update your profile; upon request, we can delete data unless retention obligations apply.

rights.title: 10. Your rights
rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights in particular:
rights.item1: Access to your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR).
rights.item3: Erasure of your data (Art. 17 GDPR), where applicable.
rights.item6: Objection to processing (Art. 21 GDPR), where applicable.
rights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at: kontakt@skillspot.de

security.title: 11. Security
security.content: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data. However, complete security of data transmission over the internet cannot be guaranteed.

changes.title: 12. Changes to this privacy policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy if features or legal requirements change. The current version is available in the app.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Do you have questions about Skillspot or need help? Feel free to contact us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
